title: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman to embark on 6-day visit to Morocco to attend World Bank-IMF meet, G20 FMCBG
description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman will leave on a six-day official visit to Marrakech, Morocco, on Tuesday, October 10, to attend the World Bank-International Monetary Fund annual meeting, along with the G20 FMCBG (Finance Ministers and Central Bank Governors) meeting. title: How to Get the Best Exchange Rate When Traveling Abroad
description:
Every time you spend money abroad, there's a chance you're losing some of it without realizing. Banks, ATMs, and merchants all add hidden fees or offer poor exchange rates. These small losses can add up fast, especially on longer trips. Still, there are ways to keep more of your money.

title: CATDEFI: Morocco’s Economic Reforms and Infrastructure Expansion Accelerate
description: Morocco is rapidly emerging as a new hotspot for Real-World Asset (RWA) investment, driven by expanding infrastructure development, a resilient economic structure, and sustained institutional reforms. title: OPINION: Gauteng’s role in unlocking Africa’s growth through trade
description:
Africa’s economic future has arrived, and Gauteng has a role in leading it.

title: Morocco’s Tourism GDP Rises by 38% in 2024, Reaching 7.3% of National Economy
description:
Rabat – Morocco’s tourism sector continued its strong recovery in 2024, with new figures from the High Commission for Planning (HCP) showing a sharp rise in the Tourism Satellite Account.

title: Morocco and Spain Set to Meet for 13th High-Level Meeting
description:

title: MEPs to grill European Commission over tweaks to EU-Morocco pact
description:
The European Parliament’s agriculture committee is poised to confront European Commission officials on Thursday over efforts to amend the bloc’s trade deal with Morocco over the status of Western Sahara.
